```python
from vpython import *

# Screen settings
scene.width = 700
scene.height = 400

# Cyber Input Variables
Angle_I = 5
Gyroscope_I = vector(0, 0, 4)

# Constants
g = 9.81  # acceleration due to gravity

# Function to reset the object position and velocity
def reset_position():
    ball.pos = vector(0, Gyroscope_I.y, 0)
    ball.v = vector(Angle_I, 0, 0)

# Create ground and ball
ground = box(pos=vector(0, -0.1, 0), size=vector(10, 0.2, 10), color=color.green)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, Gyroscope_I.y, 0), radius=0.1, color=color.red)
ball.v = vector(Angle_I, 0, 0)  # initial velocity

# Animation loop
dt = 0.01
t = 0
while True:
    rate(100)
    t += dt
    
    ball.pos.x = ball.v.x * t
    ball.pos.y = Gyroscope_I.y + ball.v.y * t - 0.5 * g * t**2
    
    if ball.pos.y <= 0:
        ball.v.y = -ball.v.y  # reverse the y velocity upon bouncing
        t = 0  # reset time
```
